# cook your dish here
from collections import Counter
for _ in range(int(input())):
    n= Counter(input().strip())
    print(n['4'])

# cook your dish here
n = int(input())
while n>0:
    s=input()
    print(len(s.split('4'))-1)
    n = n-1

from collections import Counter
n=int(input())
for i in range(n):
    k=list(input())
    c=Counter(k)
    print(c['4'])

for tc in range(T):
	# Read number
	num = int(input())
